00029 #ifndef _AAL5SEND_H
00030 #define _AAL5SEND_H
00031 
00032 #include "inxout.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 
00035 class   aal5send:       public inxout
00036 {
00037    typedef      inxout  baseclass;
00038  public:
00039    void init(void);
00040    void early(event *);
00041    rec_typ REC(data *, int);    // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00042    
00043    int  command(char *, tok_typ *);
00044    int  export(exp_typ *);
00045    
00046    void restim(void);   // resets the time dependent values
00047    
00048    queue        q;              // input queue
00049    int  q_start;        // queue length at which to wake up the sender
00050    
00051    int  fixVCI;         // TRUE: do always use the VCI specified in definition statement
00052    int     new_cid;     // the new CID
00053    int     CopyClp;        // must clp bit be copied?
00054    int     NewClp;         // the new clp bit
00055    int     Pt1Clp0;        // must Pt=1 cells be set to CLP=0?
00056    int  maxcid;         // range of layer-4 connection IDs
00057    int  *translationTabVCI;// translation connection ID -> VCI
00058    // NULL: copy connection ID of packets into VCI of cells
00059    int  *translationTabCID;// translation connection ID -> new ID
00060    
00061    
00062    
00063    int  *cellSeqTab, *curCellSeq;       // cell sequence numbers (one for each connection)
00064    int  *sduSeqTab, *curSduSeq;         // SDU seq no
00065    
00066    size_t       sdu_cnt;        // SDUs sent
00067    size_t       del_cnt;        // counter of not transmitted frames because of not minded StopSend
00068    
00069    int  flen;           // number of bytes still to send for the current frame
00070    int  first_seq;      // first cell sequence number of an AAL-PDU:
00071    // is retransmitted in last cell
00072    
00073    rec_typ      prec_state;     // state of the preceeding object
00074    rec_typ      send_state;     // state of this object
00075    
00076    int     addHeader;      // length of additional header (e.g LLC/SNAP)
00077    
00078    enum {SucData = 0, SucCtrl = 1};
00079    enum {InpData = 0, InpStart = 1};
00080    
00081    tim_typ      last_tim;       // when sent last (only a check to prevent sending twice in a slot)
00082    
00083    int printwarning;  // print warning messages (start/stop signal not recognized)?
00084    
00085 };
00086 
00087 #endif  // _AAL5SEND_H
